PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-04782012-04-05,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CIC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of KEN S. SANDHU of Gloucester, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Head Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective June 21, 2012; designation of KEN S. SANDHU to be Deputy Chairperson of the Refugee Protection Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board until the day prior to the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act; and designation of KEN S. SANDHU to be Deputy Chairperson of the Refugee Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board effective on the day of the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act.
AttachmentsAttachment
